Hello, I need supplies for the trip!🙂 Yep, me too🙂 I need 3 water, 2 firewood, and one food. It would be good if I got that!  🙂🙂🙂☹️☹️ Oh, that's not possible.  Sorry☹️ Sry for the extra emoticons, laptop's glitching apparently. Well, what can you give me or we come to a deal on? 🙂 Well, let me think on that.  Why do you need so much water for a starter? I get dehydrated easily. I need to water so that doesn't happen. 🙂 Hmm.  And why do you need so much food? I need an extra supply of food, as I exercise a lot! 🙂 Hmmm.  And the firewood? I get cold easily. I need the firewood to get warm. I might catch a cold.🙂 I think water should be your priority.  You have food and firewood also in your basics.  I will let you have the 3 water but I will need the 3 Firewood and the 3 Food.  I have a medical condition. Okay that works well. I accept! 🙂 Good.  It's a deal. It was good working with you! 🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hey there! I'm assuming you enjoy going camping? Yes I do, I am going this weekend. Are you going camping too? Same! I try to go every other weekend. Oh cool. What supplies do you prefer to take the most of? I do a lot of hiking mostly, love to take scenic photos. I usually carry food and water supplies? Me too. I am not good at hunting or fishing. So I generally try to take extra food Haha I suck at those activities as well. I don't usually don't eat a lot, so I'm happy to exchange some food supplies for water supplies.  I would be willing to do that. What do you propose? I get 2 water, 1 food and 1 firewood, you get 1 water, 2 food and 2 firewood.  You know what that sounds extremely fair. I would accept that offer Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Have you checked to see what the weather has been like in the area you are going to?? Definitely I will checked. I m eager to prepare each & every things for the trip I have checked and see that it is in the rainy season! I know I need to pack some extra firewood if you can spare me some?? yes. I will definitely give you. I bring extra woods. Great! Can I take 2 and you can have 1?? I am willing to give you 2 of the water then! Its pleasure to me. Will you give food extra 1 to me? I suppose I could do that. I am worried a disease has possibly spread to the area due to the very wet weather, but I can sure fish for most of my food then! dont worry at all. while preparing  trip, we should take proper precautions. Hello! I am looking forward to the camping trip but could use a few more supplies! hello, me too, i guess we can share Sounds good, I need food the most, what is your most needed item? my item is food too. Ok, other than food I could use some firewood. Maybe you could take 2 food and I could take 2 firewood? sure, but i will get what then? How about you take 2 food, 1 firewood, and 1 water? no it is not enough for me, i need more water How about you take 1 food, 1 firewood, and 2 water? 2 food 2 water and 1 firewood will be good I could agree to you taking 2 food, 2 water, and 0 firewood Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

hai friend, me and my team going to trip on some snow fall place i want some help from you Yeah sure. I do my level best . okay friend. In my team old age sicked peoples and kids are there so i need some extra package. Okay friend. Which item do you need the most? I need 3 pack of fire wood and 2 pack of food and 2 pack of water But If I will give you these items I don't get enough package friend. i understand friend, we going to a snow fall place so we need fire wood and sicked and kids are in my team so i need food and water Okay I will give you 2 firewood 2 food and 1 water. food and water is ok, but i must need 3 pack of fire wood friend okay I will give you 3 firewood 1 food and 1 water because I too have family,there two old people and 1 child. understand my situation friend i need the food and water for old age sicked people and my kids, 1 pack of food and water not enough  Submit-Deal Reject-Deal wait friend please understand my situation i need food and water 2.  okay I accept the deal Are you sure friend. ? yeah sure friend I understand your situation🙂 wow. thank you so much friend. so kind of you Thanks for the help. Hey there! Hi! What are your preferences?  Food is of the highest preference for me! I am a diabetic and always need to be able to eat if I'm experiencing a low! How about you? Food is also my highest preference, followed by firewood, with water being the lowest. I don't have a medical condition that needs food so I can give you 2 units if I can have 1? That would be great if you could!  I can do that! What's your next highest priority? I would prefer 2 firewood as I need to be warm at all times and plan to camp in the cooler weather I can easily give you two firewood! One should be more than enough for me. Especially since you helped me out with the food! I would appreciate that! How do you feel about water?  I would like at least one water. I would be more than happy to give you an extra water as well for helping me with the food! I would appreciate that!  ok awesome, do we  have a deal then?  Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hey!  I hope you're having a good week and staying well.  So we are negotiating on supplies! 🙂 Yes. Hoping we can make a good deal. Me too!  I'm hoping for two food items and one water.  I'm diabetic so if my blood sugar drops, I may need the extra carbs.  And water because water is important! 🙂  I prefer two water and one food. I can understand why you need the extra food items. I'm not much of a snacker but do drink a lot of water all the time. Keeps me from eating more!🙂 Lol, it seems it was easy for us to come to a deal!  I'm super bad at drinking water (trying to get better) so I don't feel I'll need as much.  Do you want all of the firewood or should I take one and you take two?   I don't have a preference on the firewood. You may have two if you like. It's so hot that I don't cherish the idea of a fire BUT it does keep the bugs at bay!🙂 Ooh, I didn't think of that!  I'm not a huge fan of fire but I'm even less a fan of bugs.  I'm good with two in that case.  I think we still have to meet the 10 message minimum before we can submit a deal.  So how's your day going? So far, so good but it is too hot outside to enjoy. I have been watering the garden and trying to convince my dog to come out and play but she is not interested. Lol, it's hot here too!  We are always in the 110-118 degrees out in the desert.  What kind of dog do you have? She is a Corgi with a fluffy coat so she is not a big fan of the heat. I guess you get a dry heat near the desert. We have a lot of humidity which is oppressive. Hoping it will be cooler on our camping trip! Oh yeah, it's really dry here.  I sort of prefer that.  I haven't been in humidity much but it's so gross feeling.  Corgis are adorable!  Okay, I think we're ready to make a deal.  It was so nice chatting with you! Same here! Thanks for your cooperation. It was so nice to chat with you. Stay safe, well AND cool! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, how are you today? hello, I am good, I am very excited about this trip. how are you? i am great, super excited about camping as well, are there any supplies that you really need? i really need water and food. we did not get enough of those. Those are my priorities as well, how about you get all the food and two firewoods, and i get all the water and one firewood, does that sound fair? i would prefer water instead of food if possible, but i am sure we can work it out. water is really important for me, how about i get two waters and three firewoods and you get three foods and one water? i can work with 1 water 3 food and 1 firewood ok that works for me good, we used all the water to fix overheated car. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Oh my, it's a bit hotter out here then I expected. I hope that I brought enough water for this camping trip. Hi! Are you excited? Yes, I am but I do have my worries. How about you?  Me too! im bringing my 5 month old baby with me and im worried im not gonna be able to find purified water for his formula! Ah, Baby's first camping trip. 🙂 But that is a bit of a big worry.  Yea so I was hoping i could get 3 of the waters if possible and 1 firewood and you can have the rest! I really wish I could take you up on that offer but I could really use some of that water as well. Perhaps, I can get one water while I'll give you some extra food. okay so how about i take 2 waters 1 firewood and 2 food? Are you sure that's enough firewood for you and the baby? I know that babies can easily get very sick from dropping temperatures.  would you mind then if i take 2 waters 2 firewood and 1 food? does that work for you? That sounds like a deal to me. Please be careful with your baby on your trip.🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi! How are you doing? I'm well! Excited for this camping trip. Same! I'm a little worried about some of my supplies though. What about you? Likewise! What are you most in need of? Well, I'm camping up on a snowy mountain and I gave some of my food away to hikers who were passing me and were very tired and hungry, so I'd really like to get some more food. Firewood would be useful too, although I do have a thick coat and a sleeping bag. I plan on melting the snow to get water, so I don't think I'll need that too much. And you? I have the same needs. I have a low metabolism, so I need food and firewood to keep me warm and energized. Water I plan on filtering elsewhere. Ok, well, I'd like to help. How about if I take 2 food and 1 firewood and 2 water, and you can keep the rest? Would you mind if you got 3 food and 1 water and I got 3 firewood and 2 water? I'd like some firewood though... Would 3 food and 1 firewood for me work? I would probably do that, yes Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello!  Great to see another camper here going for a hike.  My family is looking forward to a great weekend here.🙂 Mine too! Camping is one of my favorite things to do with my family. It should be a good weekedn for it.  Unfortuately the air;ine loss our luggage with the sleeping bags and food.  Not a good start for us with my mother-in-law along for the first time.  My wife and her is down getting trail maps while I sort out keeping warm tonight and feed after some hiking. Oh no! That sounds like a problem. I have four kids so I can relate about the concerns for staying warm and having enough food. I see they have some supplies here to share between the camp sites.  Maybe we can divide up the supplies so it works for both of us.  I can really use 2 wood and 2 food.  What about yourself?🙂 I think food is pretty important for you, so I'm ok with you having 2 food and I'll take 1 food. Since you get more food I think it's only fair I get 2 firewood while you take 1. You can collect more firewood along the way. I didn't have room to pack firewood either with our smaller car. Sounds good on the food.  I was really hoping for doing roasting lots of marshmellows for s'mores eachnight along with staying warm.  If I keep 2 wood could you do with 2 water instaed?   I have a kid obsessed with fire. He was really looking forward to a fire every night and marshmallows. I don't think I can do 1 firewood. Can you do 1 firewood and 2 water? Yeah, That would be ok with me.  That ends up with 2 food, 1 wood and 2 water for me and the rest for you?🙂 Yep. 🙂 I hope you have a great trip! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi, I really need water to stay hydrated during my camping trip because my food supplies are low. Do you have any to spare? Hi.  I can't do that right now. Is there anything that you might need?  I would be interested in firewood.  Can I ask you, what are your primary concerns on this trip? My primary concerns are staying hydrated, I have been feeling sick and throwing up from being so high up in the mountains.  Oh, so sorry to hear that.  I can understand why water would be important to you.  I am worried about being too cold at night. My sleeping bag is not rated well for cold weather (I packed the wring one). Oh I understand that for sure. I am not used to the cold weather either which is not helping. Would you be interested in a trade for water in exchange for firewood?  Well, I am worried about staying hydrated as well. Do you have food? I have been trying to hunt but have not really found any animals nearby to hunt. I do actually!  I can give you 3 foods. Would that work? Sure, I can do that. So if I give you 3 woods, can you give me 3 firewoods and 2 waters? Yes that sounds like a great deal OK great.  Please stand by.  Submit-Deal Reject-Deal Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello Hello! I am going on an expedition and am in need of provisions. The risk is much, the need is great, but the rewards are even greater! I am asking that you might allow me to have 3 firewood, 2 food, and 2 water. Why do you need so much firewood?🙂 My camping expedition is in the far reaches of the north, away from civilization. I've already lost three fingers to frostbite, and I can ill afford to lose another. In short, I need the firewood - for fire. And warmth. Sorry to hear about your problems. Are you going to Canada this time? Farther. I'm going so far north that we'll be passing over the north pole and keep going into Siberia. That sound cool, I mean cold. 🙂 It will be. And I'm grateful that you recognize the need! Will you do me a solid by permitting me to have these provisions? I can give you 3 firewood, but only 1 food and no water. Good gravy! I will need to cancel the expedition if that's all you have to spare. Can you surely do no better? I do like to have lots of water because I get thirsty on some of my longer hikes. How about I give you 3 firewood, 1 food and 1 water? I see. I can get by without the water, but I need more food. With 2 food, I will probably need to eat my dog, but I will survive. Will you give me 3 firewood, 2 food, and no water? That sounds good to me. Let's make this deal. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello! I'm so excited for this camping trip. What do you still need as your supplies? I think food, water, and firewood are all going to be fairly important. I agree. I have diabetes, so water and food are super important to me. My diabetes makes me super thirsty and I have to make sure I keep my blood sugar under control with certain foods ☹️ I can definitely relate to that, I have family members with type 2 so I know how bad that can get Yes definitely! It is a pain for sure, but I love camping so I still want to go! I just have to make sure I have all the supplies I need.  I can do without extra water as long as I have food and firewood to purify water I find.  It might be better for you to have a reliable supply though. That totally makes sense! I actually am good on firewood thankfully, I got some from a person selling it from their yard a little bit ago. I would have been able to bring more with me by getting some from my parents, but my father decided he wanted to get rid of what he had left and so has been enjoying his fire pit a lot lately. Oh I have always wanted a firepit! I totally understand. If you'd like you can have all 3 of the firewood supply stash to get you started. And I think it's entirely reasonable for you to have all 3 of the water as dehydration can be very bad very quickly, especially with diabetes. That sounds like a fair deal. Food wise, how would you like to split that up? Since I'll be foraging for water and spending more energy on that, how about I take 2 food and you get 1.  Bearing in mind that you're getting all of the stable water supply. I can agree on that! You're a very agreeable person, I think we actually made a good deal. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

I'm an American-born Filipino, born to Filipino immigrants. I grew up with as much Filipino culture, without native language, and now I am accelerating my studies of Tagalog. Our native language has provided missing links between cultures that are missed in translation. Now I recognize nuance when I read books, watch movies, and listen to podcasts. I gain bits of tradition just by speaking to other Tagalog speakers. As I deepen my understanding of Tagalog, I noticed I get to explain American culture as a Filipino-American. We are as much unicorns to natives as they are to us.

Ya know, there is no feeling more universally bisexual than self-consciousness over whether you're actually bi. Or bi enough. Or bi enough to fit in in the LGBT community. Or whether you can be LGBT in a "straight" relationship. Or whether you're actually just an imposter. Or... I could go on and on.  Just know that these feelings are 100% extremely common in bi people. I can relate to all this. I know it's easier said than done, but try not to let these feelings get to you too much. You're bi and you belong in the LGBT+ community as much as any other LGBT+ person. :)
